description: This file defines a utility class `AppTheme` that provides light and dark theme configurations for a Flutter app, encapsulating color schemes, app bar styles, card themes, button styles, and input decoration themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides static methods to generate light and dark theme configurations for a Flutter application, including color schemes and component styles.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for light mode, defining colors, app bar, card, button, floating action button, and input decoration styles.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for dark mode, with corresponding color schemes and component styles.
